segments.text: You seemed to be fed up with Mary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I get sick of her . She always bends my ear about what she thinks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She is a barking dog . But she means well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I don â€™ t like anyone who would drive me crazy by telling me what to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are unfair to her . She is a very nice girl .
segments.speaker: S1
